entry.title: Introduction to My New Blog
entry.content:
I have had two blogs in the past. I enjoy blogging and have the motivation to blog, but the problem is lack of materials to write. Now I get to know that the number of posts isn’t that important, and have decided to start my new journey of blogging.

“If a writer waits for the ideal time to write, he shall die without putting a pen to paper”

- E.B. White
